#Text= Katara says : " Come on guys , we 've got to stick together .

column1: #Text=" Sokka says : " If I sweat anymore , I do n't think sticking together will be a problem .
#Text=" Toph says : " Katara , can I have some more water ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Okay , but we 've got to try to conserve it .
#Text=" Sokka says : " We 're drinking your bending water .
#Text=You used this on the swamp guy !
#Text=Urch !
#Text=" Toph says : " It does taste swampy .
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'm sorry , it 's all we have .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Not anymore !
#Text=Look !
#Text=" Katara says : " Sokka , wait !
#Text=You should n't be eating strange plants !
#Text=" Sokka says : " There 's water trapped inside these !
#Text=" Katara says : " I do n't know ... " Sokka says : " Suit yourself .
#Text=It 's very thirst quenching though .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Drink cactus juice .
#Text=It 'll quench ya !
#Text=Nothing 's quenchier .
#Text=It 's the quenchiest !
#Text=" Katara says : " Okay , I think you 've had enough .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Who lit Toph on fire ?
#Text=" Toph says : " Can I get some of that cactus ?
#Text=" Katara says : " I do n't think that 's a good idea .
#Text=Come on , we need to find Aang .
#Text=" Sokka says : " How did we get out here in the middle of the ocean ?
#Text="
